source.name: Zamanora: Ballad of the Witch - Core Book v0.9
source.author: Andreas Mourelatos
source.description:
Grim tales inspired by Balkan & Slavic folklore, for D&D 5e, D&D 2024, and the Legend in the Mist RPG.
ZAMANORA: Ballad of the Witch is a supplement for the latest edition of D&D and the Legend in the Mist RPG, inspired by Balkan and Slavic fables of yore. It is also backwards compatible with D&D 5e. Inside you will find the following:
• Rich Slavic & Balkan Folklore • A New World to Explore • 20+ Character Options • 4 Species • 7 Backgrounds • 3 Epic Backgrounds • 30+ Spells • 14 Curses • Over 60 Magic Items • Ceremonies • Poppet Magic • The Veilmark
And so much more.
Will you heed the Old Ways…or defy them?
